content:
It seems FHIR-21284 has been applied, but is not marked as applied. I do find the extensions mentioned

  • http://build.fhir.org/extension-targetelement.html
  • http://build.fhir.org/extension-targetpath.html

and there are examples now in Provenance

  • http://build.fhir.org/provenance-example1.html
  • http://build.fhir.org/provenance-example2.json.html
  • http://build.fhir.org/provenance-example3.json.html

Is there more that will be applied?
I will presume it is sufficient. Now have a proposed resolution on Provenance for J#23076 that we will discuss today.
